item.description:
Check out the top Chinese restaurant in the state for the past 10 years! (It also made Hartford's top 10 restaurants for a great first date.)

Butterfly has been popular among meetups for its Koy Lounge and karaoke, but we will be wining and dining in the restaurant to get a taste of traditional Chinese cuisine.

Perhaps karaoke will follow?

www.butterflyrestaurant.com

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of China--Butterfly in West Hartford
